fault Heritrix crawls this to eternity. You can put all sorts of
filters in=
 to try and catch it. Simple enough for any particular
instance, harder to =
do generically.

s) the best
option is to simply handle this on a case by case basis using R=
egExpr

cra=
wling to current year +/- some number.

g you may simply want 'take the
hit'. You'll never 'finish' anyway so you j=

dealing with them when you see a specific calendar b=

websites.
